name: Bug Zapper (Diego Escalante)
description:
Description:
Your AI-assisted bug zapper is buggy. It can't always tell the difference between mosquitoes and other bugs. Between each zapping interval, you must manually switch bug targets to fry the mosquitoes and save the bees.

Jam Details:
This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 51 Compo in September of 2022. The theme of the jam was "Every 10 Seconds."
